response.overview: HO HO HO to all of Santa's little whores in this skin flick. From a devilish helper with a chainsaw to cut you a lovely Christmas tree to scantly dressed elves fighting over a cock as if it were a giant candy cane, these whores get exactly what they want for Xmas and it ain't no sugarplum. Watch their pretty little mouths and holes get filled with dick, as if they were stockings to be filled by Old St. Nick!
response.title: It's A Whore's Christmas
